page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: The people who have been involved with The Domesday Project for this area are pupils of{EVELYNS COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL {and St.LAURENCES PRIMARY SCHOOL. Material from{St.Laurence}prepared by P.Martin J.Morris D.Stanton G.Jones B.Wheeler J.Wotherspoon & J.Oakes. The pupils who have written the material for{EVELYNS}are Jason Cox, Danny Carroll,Lee Crawford,Mark Kelly, David Croucher,Konrad Dancer, Warren Dye,Gerald Evans,David Hutchings,Mark Parsons,Sandra Brooks,Samantha Carter ,Joanne Desombre,Lorna Hamm,Susan Hatton,Anna Hire,Gaynor Housego,Zobia Lateef, Louise Lobjoit,Maxine Pevrill, Helen Riley,Gaynor Wensley,Samantha White,Hayley Wilkinson,Richard Kelly The programers are{MICHAEL BRILL & {SCOTT HARDY}for Evelyns and{Mr.J.Oakes for St.Laurence.
